summary: Elven themed castle, fully detailed, lots of displays and storage. Located not too far from Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#FAAC58]Moonstone Castle[/color][/size]

[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56533-0-1444520463.jpg[/img]

Elven themed castle, fully detailed player home. It must be purchased for 20,000 (Check the sign next to the main gate). Located not too far from Whiterun, around the corner from my other mod Skystone Castle. Has loads of displays and storage, pool undressing for NPC's, unique item displays (Black Books ect)

Compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] so you can move your family in.

[color=#BEF781]Requires all DLC's[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] Required to move your family in (Cast the "Bless Home" spell)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76368/?]Real Shelter Patch by kojak747[/url] If you're using Real Shelter

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56533-5-1410586484.png[/img]

[youtube]5Jf0YAy3Mrc[/youtube]

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]Features[/size][/color]
Throne Room - Bedroom, Kids Room (6 beds), Massive Pool
Keep - Crafting stations, Display Room, Dining Area
Barracks - Bar, small pool, 14 beds
Undercroft - Vampire themed room

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]Recommended mods[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floors Sandboxing by Dovahklon[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?]Jaxonz Positioner by Jaxonz[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?]Jaxonz Renamer by Jaxonz[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62040/?]My Home Is Your Home[/url]

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]My Homes[/size][/color]
